channel.title: What Are You Getting For Christmas/Chanuka/Yule/Kwanza/Eid?
channel.description:
Hey,
Just wondering what people were getting for the holidays. I got a $400 budget from my parents, and then I'll get more from friends and other relatives. My Mom let's me pick what I want.
I'm Getting: 80Gb Black iPod [img]http://www.pictureline.com/images/medium/AP6476_ipod_black.jpg[/img] Red Ghast Pants [img]http://us.st11.yimg.com/us.st.yimg.com/I/villagestreetwear_1970_172572352[/img] Black Ghast Pants [img]http://us.st11.yimg.com/us.st.yimg.com/I/villagestreetwear_1970_172548627[/img] Pentacle [img]http://themagickalcat.com/store/image/gpk4/Pendants_Pendant_-_Pentagram_-_Large_Upright.jpg[/img] Behind The Hatchet ICP Shirt [img]http://secure.hatchetgear.com/img/icp3650_blk.jpg[/img] Solitary Witch [img]http://ec1.images-amazon.com/images/I/51RA9DG5NSL._BO2,204,203,200_PIsitb-dp-500-arrow,TopRight,45,-64_OU01_AA240_SH20_.jpg[/img] To Ride A Silver Broomstick [img]http://www.llewellyn.com/book/L279.jpg[/img]
Total Price With Shipping & Handling: $404.54
It's gonna be a good December 21st =)

item.title: What Are You Getting For Christmas/Chanuka/Yule/Kwanza/Eid?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Well I’m heading on over to Australia for a 3 week break for Christmas. Probably will get just a couple of games and some money because we have to take presents with us and we can’t lug about anything large.

Read full topic

item.title: What Are You Getting For Christmas/Chanuka/Yule/Kwanza/Eid?
item.dc:creator: @Clear Clear
item.description:
@Clear wrote:

I’m going to Florida for two weeks for Christmas. We are celebrating it there too
And then I get a 1,500$ USD budget to go spend on whatever I want
I wish I got more but I can’t this year because we just bought a 5,000$ computer, re shingled the roof, and re-modeled our kitchen…

Read full topic

@r4ndom1 wrote:

wow mostly all rich bitches. I’ll probably get like a lump of coal. (unless it helps them im not getting anything more than £100.) Thinking of getting like piping for a potato cannon and a micro proccessor for robotics etc. But what can i tell the people at school lolol, they will think im even more of a nerd. Ah ill just ask for money.

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

Chimaera God:

ill probably get an iPhone from my grandparets, maily because my sis jus got 1 for her b-day. other than that, my friends’ll probably give me lots of money and my family will give me videogames that i already have :eek:. my girlffriend mght give me something special too, like some cherry pie (wink wink). speakin about that, i gotta buy some more rubbers …(speaking in a gradually lowering tone)

sounds nice but the cherry pie thing is un-needed xD

~XDZ

item.title: What Are You Getting For Christmas/Chanuka/Yule/Kwanza/Eid?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:82, topic:148926”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=204192.msg1810597#msg1810597 date=1191831888]

Well, at the moment im getting 6gb of RAM, 2 external 500gb hard drives, a new laptop, some games for my ps3, money and i don’t know what else yet.
ror
Probably an ipod touch.

What are you going to do with at least 1TB? That’s just a waste. 6GB of Ram? Why, your not going to notice the difference after 3 or 4.
[/quote]

He runs vista, he’ll just be scratching 5% spare ram load with 6gb. :p[/quote]
I barley run vista,(havnt used it for more than probably an hour total since i started using kubuntu, even less now i use sabayon) and im only putting an extra 2gb ram on the computer i have vista on, making it 4gb ram on this.
Im using the other 4gb on other computers.

Read full topic
